properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 21 at 8:03AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
The areas affected include...
Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10
nm...
Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60
nm...

At 803 AM PST, Doppler radar indicated a line of thunderstorms,
capable of producing winds to around 30 knots and half inch hail.
These thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 nm
west of Cape Shoalwater to 7 nm west of Cape Disappointment to 10 nm
south of Columbia River Buoy 29, moving northeast at 35 knots.

Locations impacted include...
Cape Shoalwater, Cape Disappointment and Columbia River Buoy 29.
This includes the outer sections of the Columbia River Bar.
properties.instruction:
Mariners can expect gusty winds to around 30 knots, locally higher
waves, and lightning strikes. Boaters should seek safe harbor
immediately until these storms pass.

NWSheadline: THUNDERSTORMS AFFECTING WATERS OFF THE NORTHWEST OREGON AND SOUTHWEST WASHINGTON COAST
